subject: Re: JUnit as Addin to JDeveloper 9i?
msgSnippet: ... JDeveloper ... testing ... Hi Jim, Any success in getting JUnit to run as an addin with JDeveloper9i? Cheers, Eddie
messageBody:
--- In junit@y..., "jim_stoll" <jim_stoll@y...> wrote:
> Has anyone setup JUnit as an Addin to JDeveloper 9i? The
JDeveloper
> setup at www.junit.org appear to be for the prior version of
> JDeveloper (3.x) and does not work (for me at least) w/ the 9i
> version. I can dig into it myself if no one has done so, but am
> hoping that someone has already done this and can help me save some
> time and effort (that really needs to go toward building and
testing
> my code... :-)
>
> Thanks,
>
> Jim

Hi Jim,
Any success in getting JUnit to run as an addin with JDeveloper9i?
Cheers,
Eddie
